name: King Minos' Labyrinth
description:
A Metroidvania game made in 30 days for the Metroidvania Month 19 Game Jam.

You play as Asterius, the Minotaur. You are locked in the labyrinth of King Minos' and you must complete his 3 trials to escape. Explore the Arena, Garden, and Catacombs, collecting items to help you progress through the maze. Use your abilities to find health upgrades to assist you in completing the trials. Can you escape?
